intent_atoms.description: Child boxes cannot exceed parent ranges and overlapping payloads must be flagged during structural validation.
FilesystemAccessKit logs bookmark identifiers, refreshes stale ledger entries, and removes invalid recents to persist security‑scoped bookmarks.
VoiceOver regression pass for accessibility shortcuts: verify that new focus command menu announces controls and restores focus targets on macOS and iPadOS hardware.
Real‑world assets (Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9 etc.) must be licensed before synthetic payloads can be replaced and regression baselines refreshed.
Snapshot & CLI fixture maintenance is triggered by setting ISOINSPECTOR_REGENERATE_SNAPSHOTS=1 and running swift test --filter JSONExportSnapshotTests when schema updates are intentional.

functional_units.name: Enforce Parent Containment and Non-Overlap
functional_units.description: Validates that child boxes are within parent ranges and flags overlapping payloads for CLI/UI surfaces.

functional_units.name: Persist Security-Scoped Bookmarks
functional_units.description: Logs bookmark identifiers, refreshes stale ledger entries, and removes invalid recent items in FilesystemAccessKit.

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Regression Pass for Accessibility Shortcuts
functional_units.description: Manual VoiceOver verification on macOS/iPadOS to ensure focus command menu announces controls and restores focus targets.

functional_units.name: Real-World Assets Licensing
functional_units.description: Secures licensing for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, MPEG-H fixtures to replace synthetic payloads and refresh regression baselines.

functional_units.name: Snapshot & CLI Fixture Maintenance
functional_units.description: Refreshes snapshots and CLI fixtures when schema updates occur via ISOINSPECTOR_REGENERATE_SNAPSHOTS environment variable.
